subject: Soccer
World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Brian Ching scored his third goal of the season in the 68th minute, Tony Caig made three saves to earn his first career M.L.S. shutout, and the Houston Dynamo beat the visiting Red Bulls, 1-0, on Saturday night.
snippet: Brian Ching scored his third goal of the season in the 68th minute, Tony Caig made three saves to earn his first career M.L.S. shutout, and the Houston Dynamo beat the visiting Red Bulls, 1-0, on Saturday night.
